isis.stitle: ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - DO NOT SHIFT LIGHT

svcproc.title: DO NOT SHIFT LIGHT
svcproc.para: The DO NOT SHIFT LIGHT, located in the instrument cluster, receives ignition voltage from 5A fuse A2, on circuit 28A at connector 26-1 (connector 26 cavity 1). The "Do Not Shift" light ground circuit goes through the VIM to the ECU. The illumination of the light is controlled by a ground switch located in the WT ECU.
The ECU closes a ground switch causing the "Do Not Shift" light to illuminate, or opens the ground switch causing the light to not be illuminated, in response to system commands from the WT ECU.
